data.name: HITMAN 3 - Berlin
data.detailed_description: Head to the outskirts of Berlin, a city known for its fairy tales, vibrant style and chaotic nightlife. Whether you’re looking for a place to reflect and recuperate or want to experience the dizzying adrenaline rush of an epic rave, Berlin will help you find them both.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7870

  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 4790 4 GHz
